tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Reshaping,Artificial Teeth,
review:
I am writing to share my extraordinary experience with Dr. Aparna Singhal, who recently performed a tooth cap placement, teeth reshaping, and root canal treatments for me. I feel compelled to express my immense satisfaction and gratitude for the outstanding care and results I have received.

Dr. Aparna Singhal's commitment to providing exceptional dental care is truly commendable. From the moment I walked into her clinic, I was greeted with professionalism and warmth. One of the things that impressed me the most was the punctuality of the treatments. Dr. Singhal's respect for her patients' time is evident, and I always appreciated being seen promptly at my scheduled appointments.

Her soft-spoken and friendly demeanor instantly puts you at ease. Dr. Singhal took the time to explain each procedure thoroughly, addressing all my concerns with patience and understanding. This level of communication not only demonstrated her expertise but also made the entire process much more comfortable for me.

I must also highlight the reasonable pricing of Dr. Singhal's services. In an industry where costs can often be a concern, I found her fees to be fair and transparent. This commitment to affordability without compromising on quality is truly praiseworthy.

Throughout my treatment, Dr. Aparna Singhal exhibited a great understanding of my needs and concerns. She approached my case with a tailored plan, ensuring that every step was in line with my expectations. Her cooperative attitude and willingness to involve me in decision-making further strengthened my trust in her abilities.

The results of Dr. Singhal's work speak volumes about her skill and dedication. The tooth cap, teeth reshaping, and root canal treatments she performed have been life-changing for me. I can now smile with confidence, and the positive impact on my self-esteem is immeasurable. Dr. Aparna Singhal has truly transformed my dental health, and I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

In conclusion, I am immensely grateful for the exceptional job Dr. Aparna Singhal has done. I am now a walking testament to her expertise, and I encourage anyone in search of a skilled, compassionate, and reliable dentist to consider Dr. Singhal. Thank you for making a significant difference in my life!

Warm regards,
Rahul Khorwal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is really intelligent and kind. Genuine treatment option given, not like most I have found and really cares for the patient.

I was experiencing pain in my right lower teeth and visited for the same to the zenith clinic.
Dr Aparna listened me patiently and helped me in understanding  the reason for the pain which i was experiencing and advised me to go for the RCT for the same teeth.
The entire process  of RCT performed by Dr. Aparna was painless and smooth & it has been really amazing since then.
Not only she cured me but Practice followed by Dr. Aparna Mam was for the RCT was different and she explained me the entire process for drilling the gum deep enough to fit the crown with strong grip.

Thanking Dr. Aparna Mam for diagnosing my issue and i wish her success for her future endeavours.

review: Hello. I am parnanand. I had visited a dentist near to my house for tooth pain. He did 3/4 times treatment but there was no relief. I was taking 6 medicines daily. There was absolutely no relief. My brother is a friend of dr vijay singhal. I came to Dr  Aparna for treatment. She did treatment for one time and stopped the medicines. In one time only I got full relief from tooth pain. I highly recommend her for tooth pain* *** ** **** **** ********

review: I visited Dr Aparna Singhal Ma'am for dental cleaning. She was quite patient, assured me that procedure would be painless which it was, and nicely explained other dental issues that I had. I'm really grateful to Aparna Ma'am for everything she did. A big thanks to Practo too.
